Title: James Cameron
Text: James Francis Cameron (born August 16, 1954) is a Canadian filmmaker, philanthropist, and deep-sea explorer.

Title: Sting
Text: Gordon Matthew Thomas Sumner CBE (born 2 October 1951), known as Sting, is an English musician, singer, songwriter, and actor.

Title: Greenpeace
Text: Greenpeace is a non-governmental environmental organization with offices in over 39 countries, described as the most visible environmental organization in the world.

Title: International Rivers
Text: International Rivers is a non-profit, non-governmental, environmental and human rights organization.

Title: Movimento Xingu Vivo para Sempre (MXVPS)
Text: Movimento Xingu Vivo para Sempre (MXVPS) is a collective of social and environmental organizations from the areas of influence of the Belo Monte hydroelectric project

Title: BNDES
Text: The National Bank for Economic and Social Development (abbreviated: BNDES) is a federal public company associated with the Ministry of Development, Industry, and Trade of Brazil.

Title: FUNCEF
Text: is the third largest pension fund in Brazil and one of the largest in Latin America.
